backend/main.mo: Defines authentication logic with email/password signup, login, session handling, and role assignment using access control and in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Declares feature evidence linking frontend files to authentication updates and actor type regeneration requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global background/foreground theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the TimerScreen component with theme and email/password auth providers.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Renders a dropdown for selecting WCA events, disabled during solves.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal for login/signup with validation, error display, and interaction with the email/password auth hook.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Card showing the current scramble with a button to generate a new one and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Uses TwistyPlayer from a CDN to render 2D puzzle visualizations for scrambles with basic error handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Displays session stat values in a card using provided stats object.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Renders a scrollable grid of past solves with formatted times and outcome badges.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Shows the timer UI, formatting time based on state and handling pointer events.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer screen managing scramble generation, solves list, authentication modal, and session persistence.
frontend/src/config/iiOrigins.ts: Defines stable and alternative Internet Identity derivation origins.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
Provides email/password auth context with signup, login, logout, and session restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity, login, and state restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder noting no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates and stores WCA scrambles using cubing.js, with loading state and event-based regeneration.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: React hook managing WCA-style timer states, inspection countdown, audio warnings, and solve timing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and timer UI.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Utility handling Web Audio API initialization and playing 8s/5s inspection warning beeps.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Saves and loads session data in cookies with JSON encoding and basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Calculates session stats including current, best, averages, and mean from solve history.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Defines the list of WCA events with IDs, names, and scramble identifiers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint mounting React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Type declarations for cubing.net scramble and twisty player modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve entry types and helpers for formatting and computing effective times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, including known issues with silent signup failures and feature requests to align frontend auth flows with updated backend actor methods.
